activities: The use of information collected through our service shall be limited to the purpose of providing the service for which the Client has engaged Skyhigh Networks.  We may collect personally identifiable information from you (including, without limitation, your name, billing address, shipping address, email address, phone number, event type and date) when you provide it to us such as when you create an account, enter a promotion, sign-up for a newsletter, participate in a survey, contact customer service or otherwise interact with us. We may maintain a record of the purchases you make with us.  Personally identifiable information also includes information regarding which software-as-a-service (SaaS) websites, and any websites, are used, by whom used, when used and the frequency of use.  We may use your personally identifiable information in the following ways: to communicate with you and to send your information by email, postal mail, telephone, or other means about our products, services, promotions and the like; to administer and fulfill information requests and our promotions and offers, and, if you order products or services, to process and fulfill your order and to send you emails to confirm your order status and shipment; to help us learn more about your preferences; to help us address problems with and improve our site design, products and services; to enhance your experience with Skyhigh Networks; to analyze trends and statistics; to protect the security or integrity of our websites and business; and to contact you if necessary.
contactname1: Glenn Mulvaney c/o Skyhigh Networks Inc.
